extendedInfo.description: ZDNet delivers news, analysis and reviews to our global audience of IT professionals and decision makers in Australia, Asia, France, Germany and the UK. We offer our audience a range of options to stay up-to-date whilst they are on the go, including our mobile sites and now the free ZDNet International App, which brings you the best ZDNet content from around the world. This global app enables you to explore the latest content from ZDNet Asia, Australia, France, Germany and the UK. You can discover the most popular content on each site, the latest blog posts, and explore each siteâs Twitter conversations. We have included a feed of the latest news from ZDNet.com, our US site, so you can have a truly global perspective on the IT industry. Get involved in the conversation with share functionality for Twitter and Facebook, and email capability to share with your colleagues and peers. We will continue to optimise this app for our readers, so we welcome your feedback. Please let us know how we can improve this to meet the demands of your role in the IT Industry.

reviews.title: No font control, sharing useless
reviews.comment: Article font size is too small to read.  Email share feature only shares the subject.  Does not include article text or link.  You need to read your own published articles about mobile strategy!  Using samsung charge on verizon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Appalling
reviews.comment: Didn\'t believe the comments. Now I know better. It looks nice at first, til you read an article and find the pictures aren\'t visible. Instead you\'re expected to click a bar at the foot of each article to view the accompanying pics; except you get a series of blank screens!   Utterly unbelievable. Not to mention the comments which are displayed without their icons, and apparently no way to reply or post your own.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless App
reviews.comment: Have had this app on my samsung S3 and tablet , and IT JUST NOT WORK on either fetches up a list of subjects , pick on and the app just shuts down so for me it`s rated at 0/5
reviews.author: Phil Monk

reviews.title: Please fix crash
reviews.comment: I rate it 3 stars coz in the last 3 months it keeps crashing on samsung g2 with ice cream update.i love your news just fix the damned bug.it crashed each time when i want to access any of the news.struggle harder.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Irritating restart every time
reviews.comment: Works fine on my Samsung Galaxy S Wifi 4.2, except it every time does an an irritating restart of the app and I have to tap to continue! Why??? When you leave the app, it shows a screen with the ZDnet logo so you have to tap the Exit button again. These two things are irritating. I also deducted a star as you can\'t change the font size, though the chosen size is OK for me.  This said, the layout is good and the photos are presented well.
reviews.author: Jorgen D

reviews.title: Font control
reviews.comment: I had to use a magnifying glass to read one of their articles on tablets. I finally gave up. I BTW I have a ew glasses, had to take them off to use the glass. I What a waste....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Interaction...
reviews.comment: Can\'t add comments?  No point in having the app if you can\'t interact without using a browser
reviews.author: Martin Davies

reviews.title: Tech Sharks
reviews.comment: In the vast technology waters ZDNet are the school of Sharks worth following, especially if you value the bleeding edges of everything.
reviews.author: Darryl Jones

reviews.title: Keeps Crashing
reviews.comment: Love the Desktop site but the App is totally unusable! This is such a pity from a tech site.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ZDNET Publications
reviews.comment: How about,  actually posting an actual description of changes and updates...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stars just went down
reviews.comment: \"MAJOR BUMMER. This video can\'t be played with your current setup\" MAJOR BUMMER. Fix your app. It ain\'t my setup\'s problem.  No zoom control so can\'t read some articles. Especially diagrams or pictures.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Print too small
reviews.comment: Print too small. Looks like an after thought. Made for a phone. Little content.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Text size settings too small
reviews.comment: Text size too small and no option to change size, what happened to the accessibility settings??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love ZDNet
reviews.author: Jonathan Cobo

reviews.title: Can not zoom / font size
reviews.comment: Does not work on nexus 7 can not zoom or increase font size. Removed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF?
reviews.comment: I can\'t add any comments?
reviews.author: Jae Yoon Kim

reviews.title: Moto Xoom 4.1.1
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing since Android upgrade.  Used to be decent magazine, now won\'t even open without crashing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: G+
reviews.comment: When could we share an article on G+ ?
reviews.author: Julien L\303\251v\303\252que-Claudet

reviews.title: Removed the option to choose location!
reviews.comment: Bring the option back!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lacking
reviews.comment: Seriously lacking in key functions including ability to comment and login.  And what about adding a few widgets?
reviews.author: A Google User
